lead_paragraph: The condition of forward Sam Ashaolu, one of five Duquesne players shot after a campus dance last weekend, was upgraded to serious from critical yesterday. Ashaolu, who was shot in the head twice, is the only player who remains hospitalized, and he has begun to speak softly.
